title: All trees already growing on the land shall be preserved to the extent possible, except that if it b
clause_text: All trees already growing on the land shall be preserved to the extent possible, except that if it becomes necessary to cut any tree, the required permission of the Competent Authority should be obtained under the law. At least 5 trees per 100 sq. m shall be planted and grown within
